titleStmt.title: Vnto those people who are called Baptists.
titleStmt.author: Wight, Thomas, of Market St., Herts.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Simmons, at the Bull and Mouth near Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: T.W., i.e. Thomas Wight.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
